general.message_continue: Add whatever you want in this section, it's your turn to play now for your app!

new_maj_screen.title: Update
new_maj_screen.content_required: An update is necessary in order to continue using My youkounkoun

forgot_password_screen.content: Enter the email associated with your account to receive a mail to change your password.
forgot_password_screen.send_mail: An email has been sent to you
forgot_password_screen.error_send_mail:
Error
The mail could not be sent

register_screen.step_one:
First step, enter the general information for creating your account.
Don't forget to accept the Terms of Use and the app's privacy policy.
register_screen.step_two: Second step, enter your personal information for creating your account. This information will be seen by all other users of the app.
register_screen.empty_search_country: No countries found for this search

home_screen.push_token: Device push token for testing push notifications via Firebase Cloud Messaging:

settings_screen.logout_content: Are you sure you want to log out?
settings_screen.delete_content: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

edit_account_screen.message_success_update_account: Your profile has been successfully updated
edit_account_screen.content: You can modify your account information right here!

edit_security_screen.content:
You can modify the security of your account right here.
Be careful, you cannot modify your email and password at the same time! One thing at a time..
edit_security_screen.error_update: Unable to modify your email and password at the same time! One thing at a time..
edit_security_screen.content_verify: Enter your current password to verify and validate your ongoing modification

validate_user_screen.send_mail: An email has been sent to you
validate_user_screen.error_send_mail:
Error
The email could not be sent
validate_user_screen.content: To validate your account, you can request a code that will be sent to the email address linked to it.

new_conversation_screen.no_recent_interactions: No recent interactions with users yet
new_conversation_screen.no_results: No results for this search yet

bottom_sheet_mentions.title: User mention(s)
bottom_sheet_mentions.content: Mention a user at any time by using @
bottom_sheet_mentions.no_recent_interactions: No recent interactions with users currently

chat_details_screen.search_giphy_content: Search and find the GIF that illustrates your current mood
chat_details_screen.no_results_giphy: No results in Giphy for this search

infos_conv_screen.delete_conv_content_1: Are you sure you want to delete the conversation between

infos_conv_screen.block_user_content: Are you sure you want to block the user

theme_conv_screen.overview_message: Overview of the Selected Conversation Theme through a Message

multimedias_screen.no_multimedias: No Multimedia for This Conversation Currently
